CustomField.formula:
( IF(ISBLANK(Title), 0, 1) + IF(ISBLANK(Department), 0, 1) + IF(ISBLANK(Division), 0, 1) +
IF(ISBLANK(Email), 0, 1) + IF(ISBLANK(Phone), 0, 1) + IF(ISBLANK(MobilePhone), 0, 1) +
IF(ISBLANK(Street), 0, 1) + IF(ISBLANK(City) , 0, 1) + IF(ISBLANK(State), 0, 1) + IF(ISBLANK(PostalCode), 0, 1)
)
/ 10
CustomField.label: Profile Percent Complete
